sentences.en: And economies of scale allow them to undercut rivals on price.
sentences.cn: 而由于大量销售而带来的优惠允许他们从价格上削弱对手.

sentences.en: Avoiding the undercut is the key factor to raise the welding speed.
sentences.cn: 避免咬边是提高焊接速度过程中的关键要素.

sentences.en: Avoiding undercut is the most important key to enhance welding speed.
sentences.cn: 避免咬边是提高焊接速度的关键问题.

sentences.en: Countries such as Chile, Argentina and South Africa can undercut Australian products.
sentences.cn: 而智利 、 阿根廷和南非等国,则能以更低的价格与澳大利亚葡萄酒抢生意.

sentences.en: External defects: undercut , overip , arc pit, gas cavity in surface, crack in surface.
sentences.cn: 外部缺陷: 咬边 、 焊瘤 、 弧坑 、 表面气孔 、 表面裂纹.

sentences.en: If our two companies were to join forces we could undercut all our competitors.
sentences.cn: 如果我们两家公司联合起来的话,我们可以削价同我们所有的竞争对手抢生意.

sentences.en: Moreover, extensive use of voluntary recalls can undercut agency accountability.
sentences.cn: 此外, 大量利用自愿撤回会削弱行政机关的责任心.

sentences.en: Online bookstores can undercut retailers by up to 30%.
sentences.cn: 网上书店最多能以低于零售店 30% 的价格销售。

sentences.en: Prices were undercut and profits collapsed.
sentences.cn: 价格被压低后，利润暴跌。

sentences.en: The appeal in Miller's pictures of Indian women is undercut at times by what the artist writes about them.
sentences.cn: 米勒画作中印第安妇女的魅力有时会被艺术家的文字描述削弱。

sentences.en: The firm will be able to undercut its competitors whilst still making a profit.
sentences.cn: 该公司将得以把价格压得低于竞争对手而仍能盈利。

sentences.en: The plastic surgeon undercut the skin of her cheek.
sentences.cn: 整容外科医生将她的脸皮下部切开.
以低于对手的价格求售

sentences.en: We are not trying to undercut the opposition.
sentences.cn: 我不是跟反对我们的人过不去.

sentences.en: We cannot buy from you because another supplier undercut you.
sentences.cn: 其他供应商的报价比你们低,所以我们不能从你处采购.

sentences.en: Width of the undercut shall match the mica thickness or OEM specifications.
sentences.cn: 下刻的宽度应与云母片相符或符合OEM的标准.

words.tran_cn: 廉价出售；较便宜的工资工作；从下边削球

trans.tran_cn: （网球等）下旋球，牛的)腰部肉，里脊
廉价出售；较便宜的工资工作；从下边削球
trans.tran_en: to sell goods or a service at a lower price than another company

trans.tran_cn: （网球等）从下削球，廉价出售，较便宜的工资工作
